Only Daughter Lollia:
You see that shiny crystal on the table? We call it the Mystic Summoning Crystal. Use that to call one of us and put your order.
You just need to press it.
One of us will come to you, and then you just need to follow our instructions. Not hard at all.
I want to tell you many more things, but Hanna insisted that she wants to introduce our employees.
Go talk to her.
